page.title: 16Marlow Botom - 3
page.content: {Housing They have many different types and styles of housing. The sides of the valley are quite steep and builders have had to cope with many steep gradients. The houses vary in styles. There are detached bungalows, three storey detached houses, semi-detached houses and in so many different styles because there have beeen so many builders. The average cost of houses at present is betweeen sixty and seventy thousand pounds. The lowest price available is Â£49 950 and the highest is Â£115 000. Builders quickly snap up any land that becomes available. Even to the extent of buying large plots of land, knocking down the original house and putting up two or three on the same plot.
